quoteText:
California Civil Code Section 1798.83 permits California residents to request certain information regarding our disclosure of personal information to third parties for their direct marketing purposes.
To make such a request, please contact us at the address provided below in the “How you can contact us” section.
<
title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

tosdr.case: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
